staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10000: Now that I think about it, I haven't properly introduced myself.
I'm the mayor of this little town.
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10001: Oh, is that your ^c:d03e37;Farm Registration Letter^c:pop;?
How nice! Let me just take that off you for filing.
In return, you get your ^c:d03e37;license^c:pop; and some very handy items!
Do you want to turn in your ^c:d03e37;Registration Letter^c:pop;?
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10002: We also have a few extras for you.
We're all looking forward to seeing the farm revitalised!
You can still turn it in later if you change your mind!
I imagine I'll be seeing you quite often!
Now that you're a fully licensed farmer...
We can finally get those stray ^c:d03e37;cattle^c:pop; off our hands!
But before we can do that, you need to build a ^c:1486b0;barn^c:pop;.
I'm not really sure I'm the best person to teach you these things.
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10003: She'll help you out with all the parts you need.
You'll probably find her hanging out around the ^c:1486b0;building store^c:pop;.
If not, your map might be able to help you locate her.
Come and see me once it's all done and we'll get you some ^c:d03e37;cows^c:pop;!
How are you faring at building that ^c:1486b0;barn^c:pop;?
^c:1486b0;{0-mech_name}^c:pop; should be able to help you out!
She's usually hanging out around the ^c:1486b0;building store^c:pop; during the day.
I've been hearing about the fabulous new ^c:1486b0;barn^c:pop; you built!
Sounds like everything is in order.
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10004: Here are the few ^c:d03e37;cows^c:pop; we managed to round up.
They all ran away when the previous owner left.
By the way, we've been looking for good builders for a long time.
Sometimes we get notices from people who want to move in here.
Before that, they need a house to live in.
Given your impressive work on the ^c:1486b0;barn^c:pop;, we'd love your help!
Come check in with me every once in a while!
New requests usually come in every week or so.
In the meantime, it might be a good idea to get to know everyone!
There's bound to be someone looking for assistance.
I know ^c:1486b0;{0-caith_name}^c:pop; has been moping around quite a bit ever since she arrived...
She's bound to have a task for you.
If that doesn't appeal, you can always head off exploring or kick back and look after the farm!
It's all up to you really! We just want to see what you make of the place!
Looks like someone new wants to move in!
Stick this ^c:d03e37;postbox^c:pop; somewhere and use it to build a house!
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10005: Once it's built, they'll move in the next day!
Make sure you use it to build our future resident a home!
Oh, before I forget, I recently managed to get post delivered to the town!
Ah ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! Just the person I wanted to see!
It's taken years of negotiation, but I've finally done it!
As of today, the postal service is adding us to their deliveries.
You need to set up this ^c:d03e37;Postbox^c:pop; to access your mail!
You could be getting mail already!
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10006: Now that their new home is complete, a new villager should move in within a day or two!
I'm sure they'll have something special for you when they arrive!
Ah, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! As the mayor of this town, I say this with a heavy heart.
I am preparing to flee the town. I suggest you do the same.
With that...creature prowling the forests, I can think of no other recourse.
Ah, is that a letter from ^c:1486b0;Riah^c:pop;?
Let me just take that off your hands.
Yes... I see... So this is about the siblings again...
She came to ^c:1486b0;Staxel^c:pop; with one of them, you know.
They were... Oh! I'm rambling again. Terribly sorry!
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10007: ^c:1486b0;Riah^c:pop; wanted you to have a few things from her account.
Allow me to have them mailed to you.
Do come by again if you'd like to chat!
Rabbits? From how many years ago?
Sorry ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, I'm afraid we don't keep those kinds of records.
My memory is not quite what it used to be either...
What can I help you with today, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;?
I must admit to having serious doubts about the whole thing.
A scientific lab? Here? With ^c:1486b0;Cecile's^c:pop; in charge?
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10008: It sounds like a recipe for disaster.
But...if you're going to be keeping an eye on her, we might just survive.
And we could certainly use the money her discoveries might bring in...
I suppose, for now, I can allow it on the condition that it be small and safely constructed.
I trust you to see to the latter. I'll be holding you personally responsible!
I must admit to being somewhat disappointed, though I have come to realise it was probably not your fault.
But this cannot be allowed to go on. I'm sure you understand.
We need to insure the town against future damages!
If we could find a ^c:1486b0;merchant^c:pop; willing to sell us insurance, that would do the trick.
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10009: My paperwork has been piling up quite a bit of late so I'm afraid I'll have to ask you to go on my behalf.
You'll find a few of them around the ^c:1486b0;town square^c:pop;.
Hmm...this does appear to be genuine. I'll reimburse you the upfront payment.
This is wonderful news for the town! Now ^c:1486b0;Cecile^c:pop; is free to blow up anything she likes!
Of course, I must warn you on principle not to cause any damage...
I eagerly await word of your success!
I'm certain at least one of the ^c:1486b0;merchants^c:pop; will be willing to cooperate...
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10010: Even with insurance, I cannot sit by and allow a monster to roam the town!
You have to do something about it. It certainly can't stay here.
Please inform ^c:1486b0;Cecile^c:pop; that if she does not get rid of it, she will be the one leaving.
A note you say? Tell me it was not sent by ^c:1486b0;Oscar^c:pop;...
Always with these notes... I understand that it's expensive to send by post...
But why do they never come to me in person?
So ^c:1486b0;Oscar^c:pop; believes we have a vandal?
I must say, with the state the town's been in recently, I was beginning to worry he was getting too old...
But a vandal...? Now that makes far more sense.
Let ^c:1486b0;Oscar^c:pop; know that the message was received, would you?
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10011: I'd tell him myself, but...I think I'd rather not!
Listen, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;. I'm sorry you were dragged into all of this.
The next election isn't even coming up for another year!
But I suppose I should at least compensate you for all this nonsense somehow...
I suspect it's not nearly adequate, but it's all I can personally offer right now.
I trust you'll vote for me next year!
You want to hear about the legendary item I bought for ^c:d03e37;{0-currency}10,000,000^c:pop;?
I think you might have added a few too many zeroes there...
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10012: But to tell the truth, I didn't buy it for myself.
You see, I know someone who would absolutely love it, and it just so happens her birthday is on the horizon!
Oh, but you absolutely must not mention a word of it to her...
This is in no way a bribe, but I do hope it will help to persuade you not to mention it to her...
We've been planning ^c:1486b0;Farm Fan's^c:pop; birthday surprise for weeks now, but we've hit a few snags.
I overspent on her gift so we can't quite afford a good venue, but there's not much we can do about that.
Hopefully the gifts themselves will be enough this year...
But more importantly, the person in charge of baking the cake ended up swamped with other orders!
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10013: Do you think you could go out and bake us a ^c:d03e37;chocolate cake^c:pop;?
We need a ^c:d03e37;chocolate cake^c:pop;. You always give cakes on birthdays, right?
Ah, perfect! This is exactly what we needed!
I'll just write ^c:1486b0;Farm Fan's^c:pop; name across the top in icing...
That should do it! So what did you get her as a gift?
You...you haven't bought her a gift yet? This is a disaster!
Hurry to the ^c:1486b0;town square^c:pop; and speak with some of the ^c:1486b0;merchants^c:pop;.
I'm sure you can pick something out from what they have there!
Did you speak to the ^c:1486b0;merchants^c:pop; yet?
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10014: You don't want something of one of the carts. If you speak to them directly they might have something special!
Hmm... Somehow I don't think this will make ^c:1486b0;Farm Fan^c:pop; very happy...
I'd suggest going back and seeing if they have something more suitable on offer...
Ah yes, that seems like the perfect gift. I just know she'll love it.
This is a bundle of all the gifts from the other villagers, except ^c:1486b0;Rowan^c:pop;.
Do you think you could swing by the ^c:1486b0;tavern^c:pop; to pick his up and then take it all to ^c:1486b0;Farm Fan^c:pop;?
I'm sure she'll be ecstatic to be given her gifts by a real farmer!
Well that went very well, I must say.
We usually try to do something for the poor girl every year, but it's not usually this successful.
I'd say it's you who helped to liven everything up!
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10015: Take this as a little something to thank you for brightening the village in general.
Here's to making next year even better!
Ah, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! I've been looking for you.
I don't know if you've participated in any of our festivals yet, but they can be rather grand events!
Rather...expensive to hold though, as I'm sure you can understand.
Yet...they also bring in a nice amount of money to local business... A bit of a paradox there.
And so, I had a thought the other day—what if we hold smaller festivals?
What if we could attract the same number of people to a much smaller and cheaper venue?
Wouldn't that be absolutely wonderful?
Now this is where you come in, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
I need you to speak to ^c:1486b0;{0-aliza}^c:pop; about the preparations.
I trust you know how to find her by now.
Head on over to ^c:1486b0;{0-aliza}^c:pop; to discuss the preparations.
The sooner we can get set up, the sooner we can start earning!
^c:1486b0;Aliza^c:pop; is all on board I assume?
Excellent! All according to plan!
Now, if I could perhaps trouble you to construct the grounds using that ^c:1486b0;signpost^c:pop;...
I think that should put us in a great place!
How are the ^c:1486b0;small festival grounds^c:pop; coming along?
I think it should be quite straightforward to set up!
Good work, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! This will serve very nicely!
There's just one final task we need to do to prepare.
Could you perhaps put these up around the town? They're ^c:1486b0;flyers^c:pop; for the upcoming festival I've planned!
Just put them on walls around the town so that everyone knows what's going on!
Still have a few more ^c:1486b0;flyers^c:pop; to put up, eh?
Well, no serious hurry, I suppose. It'll be a while before the festival kicks off.
Nice to see the marketing all set up and doing its job!
I've already had a few curious residents around asking about the harvest festival!
This is a little something for your hard work! It's much nicer to have an assistant around, I must say.
Last time I tried something like this it didn't go too well...
I'm beginning to think it was the lack of a good hard-worker like yourself!
Ah, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, perfect timing!
Preparations for the harvest festival are almost complete.
There's just a few more bits and pieces we need—perhaps something you could help with?
First, I'd like you to run on over to ^c:1486b0;{0-leif}^c:pop; and make sure he has his store ready to cope with the demand!
Then, check in with ^c:1486b0;{0-aliza}^c:pop; for any last-minute construction problems.
After that, make sure ^c:1486b0;{0-rowan}'s^c:pop; ^c:1486b0;sap^c:pop; supply is sufficiently stocked.
With luck, that will mean we're all set to launch!
Have you completed the errands I sent you on?
You need to speak with ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop;, ^c:1486b0;Aliza^c:pop;, and ^c:1486b0;Rowan^c:pop;.
It's just a case of confirming their preparedness.
Everyone is fully prepared then? Excellent!
Let the festivities begin!
I'd suggest you try to participate as much as possible!
The more people taking part, the more who will be intrigued and be enticed to participate!
Head over to the ^c:1486b0;small festival grounds^c:pop; whenever you're ready!
How are you enjoying the harvest festival, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;?
I must say that it turned out much better than expected!
Still not quite the tourist attraction I had hoped...but there's still time!
Ah, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
Did...did you win the grand prize? At a festival you helped set up?
That's... That's...
Well I suppose that's legal... We never forbade it in any way...
In any case, here is the grand prize, as promised to the bearer of the ^c:1486b0;voucher^c:pop;.
Good work, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;. I do believe we pulled off quite the event!
Good to see you, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, though I have some unfortunate news.
Despite our best efforts, it seems the festival was not quite as successful as I'd hoped...
It was moderately successful, but not fantastic. Not nearly enough to fund my new office.
We need to attract investors with significant funds—individuals who see the island's potential!
While historic tourism was the cause of my last attempt at retirement, I fear we must try it once more...
Perhaps you could put your artistic talents to good use and produce a pair of ^c:1486b0;historic statues^c:pop;?
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10021: Figures who made the island what it is today!
Once completed, place them within the town and use the ^c:1486b0;plaques^c:pop; to designate them!
I do hope those ^c:1486b0;statues^c:pop; will draw in more tourism than our previous attempt...
Excellent! Rather awe-inspiring, I must say!
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10022: I have it on good authority that our first tourists have arrived too!
Perhaps you could speak with them and gather their feedback?
It could be invaluable to ensuring their investment!
So what did the tourists have to say about our town?
Were they impressed? Have we secured investors?
They...weren't happy then? The statues were no good?
I'm sorry, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;. It seems I might have wasted your time.
But...do you think you might be up to trying again?
Maybe if we had exactly the right statues and a little bit of luck...
Maybe then someone would show a bit more interest in the town!
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10023: Make sure you remove the previous two ^c:1486b0;statues^c:pop;...
These new ones might attract a more helpful crowd...
Don't forget to remove the two ^c:1486b0;statues^c:pop; you erected before.
They didn't seem to go down too well with the visitors...
Now all we can do is hope.
I'd suggest going to see how our latest tourist is finding the town.
Perhaps this is one we might be able to convince...
I believe the new tourist is over by one of the ^c:1486b0;statues^c:pop; you placed.
Do your best to convince him so we can keep the town flourishing!
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10024: A strange man in a suit? Resorts? Glass offices?
What on earth are you rambling on about?
Apparently, a local historian was passing through when you erected those ^c:1486b0;historic monuments^c:pop;!
He immediately recognised their likenesses and realised that the island was central in some ancient war or other!
So now we're getting a grant as a world heritage site! Can you believe that?
Fantastic work, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! I couldn't have done it without you!
You practically saved the entire town! Or, its financing at least!
This is never going to be enough to repay what you've given us...
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10025: But maybe you'd appreciate the honour of being the one to place our ^c:1486b0;commemorative plaque^c:pop;?
Or not, of course! I leave that decision entirely up to you!
Ah, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;. I wasn't expecting to run into you!
A rather smart individual came by earlier and handed me a letter to pass on to you.
Unfortunately, I can't give it to you now - I already posted it!
If I had known you were coming, I would have given it to you in person...
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! Am I glad to see you.
I have no idea where I am or how I got here.
I was just in the middle of doing some... something important!
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10026: And then poof! I find myself in this primitive living space.
But never mind that... something much worse happened after that...
I misplaced my hat! I can't find it anywhere.
Someone must have stolen it! What incredibly disrespectful behaviour.
Could you help me find out who is responsible for this dreadful act?
I'll get to the bottom of this!
Have you found my hat yet?
I cannot leave this place without it.
I can't leave this place without my hat.
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10027: Please help me find the person responsible for stealing it!
The sooner this is handled, the sooner I can get back to doing important things.
My hat, I've found it! But as quickly as I found it, it was snatched away again!
You just missed the rascal responsible! You must get back my hat!
He went up the stairs. Luckily he dropped this ^c:d03e37;Bedroom Key^c:pop; on his way.
I would chase after him myself... But my stamina isn't so good after roaming around town, day in and day out.
I can't risk tripping and falling around here. Imagine the work that wouldn't get done!
Please come back when you've retrieved my hat.
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10028: Ah, you're back! Did you manage to get my hat?
Now to finally get back to business.
Although maybe I'll take a quick nap first.
Hopefully this ordeal wasn't too troublesome for you.
Maybe you should talk to Tomti?
Hmm... Maybe. He did take my hat though...
But he didn't really seem malicious.
I need to go back to the village for now. But I will talk with him if I see him. See you around!
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10029: I'm so grateful to be back. Thanks again for your help ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
I don't think I have ever been without this hat for so long...
Maybe that one time... but that was a long time ago.
Lets just work to make sure no more rapscallions take my hat!
Hold On. Just putting my hat on.
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10100: Ah ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, I assume you have received my letter?
These animals are the most precious little pets I’ve ever seen!
Alas, my friend only has the time to care for one... Which would you prefer?
The dog.
The cat.
I left some starter supplies with ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; for you.
There should be just enough there to get this little champ settled in with you.
I already gave them a name, but you may want to change it...
You can use this official ^c:d03e37;Animal Naming Form^c:pop; to do so.
All you need to do is use the form directly on your pet, or any farm animal for that matter!
Good to see you ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
I assume you're here because my correspondence reached you in a timely manner?
Right, so let's get to business then.
It doesn't look like you have your ^c:d03e37;Registration Letter^c:pop; with you...
Not to worry, it's merely a formality, we can continue without it!
I see you've brought your ^c:d03e37;Registration Letter^c:pop;, very good.
I'll just take that...
Speaking on behalf of this fine town...
We recognise the gracious acts that you have done for this community.
And that you have overhauled that old farm into fine working order...
And in doing so, we recognise that you should receive your official ^c:d03e37;Farm License^c:pop;.
Ahem... now with the official bits out of the way...
You're doing a tremendous job, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
Keep it up, and I'm sure the town will thank you.
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10101: Ah, and I left you a little celebratory gift with ^c:1486b0;Farm Fan^c:pop;.
You should find her before she chickens out.
Is that a spare ^c:d03e37;Registration Letter^c:pop; you have?
Let me take that off your hands, no need for that now!
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10200: Anyway, I assume you came because you received my letter?
These animals are the most precious little pets I’ve ever seen!
Alas, my friend only has the time to care for one... Which would you prefer?
You should go get your little celebratory gift from ^c:1486b0;Farm Fan^c:pop;.
You should find her before she chickens out...
staxel.village.dialogue.Mayor.line:10201: Have you picked up the supplies from Leif yet?
Don't want the little one to go hungry, now do we.
Seems like the little champ has bonded with you quite well.
Keep it fed and happy. Maybe it'll bring you something special.
